body_html: Looks like HIP couldn't handle the std::is_same through the __launch_bounds__ macro expansion. Adding brackets around it solved the issue. Windows failure seems unrelated, so this looks good to me.
body_text: Looks like HIP couldn't handle the std::is_same through the __launch_bounds__ macro expansion. Adding brackets around it solved the issue. Windows failure seems unrelated, so this looks good to me.
body: Looks like HIP couldn't handle the `std::is_same` through the ```__launch_bounds__``` macro expansion. Adding brackets around it solved the issue. Windows failure seems unrelated, so this looks good to me.
